sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Adversaries can use curl to download payloads remotely and execute them. Curl is included by default in Windows 10 build 17063 and later.
Detects abuse of the cron utility to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code. Detection will focus on crontab jobs uploaded from the tmp folder.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects DNS queries for IP lookup services such as "api.ipify.org" originating from a non browser process.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Execution Of Script Located In Potentially Suspicious Directory
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects executions of scripts located in potentially suspicious locations such as "/tmp" via a shell such as "bash", "sh", etc.
Detects abuse of the cron utility to perform task scheduling for initial or recurring execution of malicious code. Detection will focus on crontab jobs uploaded from the tmp folder.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Network Connection to IP Lookup Service APIs
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects external IP address lookups by non-browser processes via services such as "api.ipify.org". This could be indicative of potential post compromise internet test activity.
Detects creation of cron file or files in Cron directories which could indicates potential persistence.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research), MSTIC

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of crontab to list the tasks of the user
Detects usage of system utilities to discover system network connections
Detects a curl process start on linux, which indicates a file download from a remote location or a simple web request to a remote server

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; nocase; endswith; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047702; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_10_06, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (checkip .amazonaws .com)
ids_alerts.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Lookup Domain in DNS Lookup (checkip .amazonaws .com)"; dns.query; bsize:21; content:"checkip.amazonaws.com"; nocase; reference:url,github.com/chubin/awesome-console-services; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2054140; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2024_06_28, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2024_06_28, reviewed_at 2024_10_04, mitre_tactic_id TA0043, mitre_tactic_name Reconnaissance, mitre_technique_id T1590, mitre_technique_name Gather_Victim_Network_Information;)

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO External IP Address Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in TLS SNI
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert tls $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Address Lookup Domain (ipify .org) in TLS SNI"; flow:established,to_server; tls.sni; dotprefix; content:".ipify.org"; endswith; fast_pattern; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2047703; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Any, attack_target Client_and_Server, created_at 2023_08_22, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag External_IP_Lookup, updated_at 2023_08_22, reviewed_at 2023_08_22;)

ids_alerts.rule_category: Device Retrieving External IP Address Detected
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO External IP Check (checkip .amazonaws .com)"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:1; http.host; content:"checkip.amazonaws.com"; fast_pattern; reference:md5,966301e88d8a43abe1215413bfd48b09; classtype:external-ip-check; sid:2052027; rev:6; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2015_11_06, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, tag Description_Generated_By_Proofpoint_Nexus, updated_at 2024_04_15, reviewed_at 2024_04_15, former_sid 2814787; target:src_ip;)
